Mohamed Bouchaïb (Arabic) (Benghazi, a mụrụ n'abalị 17 ọnwa Julaị afọ 1984) bụ onye Libya na onye Algeria na-eme ihe nkiri.
A maara ya nke ọma maka ọrụ ya na Mascarades (Arabic:مسخرة) nke Lyes Salem (Arabic) duziri
Bouchaïb meriri Lumières Award maka onye na-eme ihe nkiri kacha mma maka ọrụ ya na Mascarades.
Mohamed Bouchaïb zutere Biyouna na fr:Salah Aougrout mgbe ọ dị afọ iri na itoolu, na-enye mmeghe maka ọrụ na ihe nkiri TV Algeria a ma ama Nass Mlah City (Arabic) nke Djafaar Gassem duziri.
